body.name: MACTREM Professional Camera Tripod with Phone Mount, 62" DSLR Tripod for Travel, Super Lightweight and Reliable Stability, Ball Head Tripod Detachable Monopod with Carry Bag ( Black)
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 56 mins
features: 【33LBS Max Load, stable to take sharp picture】 Max Stable Load up to 33 lbs (15 kg). The tripod offers high level of stability using great quality level of aluminum material. You can focus on composition and get ready for your photo or video without worrying your hand may be shaky. The quick release plate of ball head has a 1/4" Screw which is suitable for most cameras, camcorder, binocular and projectors. Moreover, the tripod comes with a phone holder which allows you to attach cell phone on the tripod.

【2.9LBS lightweight and Portable for travel】 Only 2.9 lbs weight and 17.5 inch compact folded size, you can easily take it in the included carry bag to anywhere for outdoor shooting. This lightweight tripod is a great companion for your long trip. In addition, the tripod can be detached as a monopod or you can also use it as an alpenstock while hiking.

【Take macro Photography with upside-down center column】 with simple steps, The center column can be turned upside-down to take macro photography. It allows your camera to get closer shoot to the objects and magnify its textured and quality. Upside-down center column is an excellent function if you want to photograph exquisite items such as jewelry, watch, earrings, necklace. You can also use it to take street photos or anything with a lower angle. Have a try, the world in macro is wonderful!

【Capture 360 degree landscape with confidence】 have you ever got a blurry or discontinuous photo using panoramic function of your cell phone? The MACTREM 360 Degree swivel ball head is the solution. Simply attach your cell phone or camera onto the tripod and rotate the ball head to take perfect pictures. The phone holder can hold mobile phone with Width less than 4.13 inch (iPhone x, 8plus, 8, Samsung S9+ etc.). You can even DIY your tripod, change the ball head to the model you like!

【Easy set up and no-hassle safe】 4-section column legs with quick release flip-locks allows you to adjust the working height from 17.5”to 62.5” in seconds. Quick-release plate makes fast transitions between shots and quickly moving from spot to spot possible
body.description: Compact and Lightweight With collapsed height 17.5 inch and 2.9 lb weight, you can easily pack the MACTREM tripod to your backpack without taking much space. It's the perfect travel option for photographers who need their tripod to be as portable as possible. Due to the restriction of material, production process, structure and operation, none of tripod on the market can be 100% stable in strong wind or uneven ground surface. The MACTREM Tripod, which balances and compromises together with lightweight, portability and stability, provides you a reliable tripod for work or travel. Also, here are some tips for you to learn some skills of using tripod to take sharper pictures: 1. Make sure all locks are tightened. 2. Hang extra weight through weight counter hook. 3. Extend thicker leg first. 4. Do not raise center column if possible. Package Included: 1 x MACTREM Tripod with ball-head; 1 x Phone holder; 1 x Carrying bag; 1 x Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This one rocks! Buy this.
reviews.reviewText: This is the best tripod! Absolutely outstanding. The legs are wonderfully protected with padding. It has several mutijointed Angles. Many different ways of going lower, and higher, and different sides.This is the tripod to get for your smartphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for a few years now and it has been great to use. No signs of wear and I have used it in all sorts of environments outdoors. It is a little heavy but other than that no real drawbacks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Matches description, relatively stable, good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this tripod to a night sky shooting on a beach. The tripod stands well against the wind from the ocean. The design is relatively convenient to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Still use it 3 years later
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this in May 2020 and all this time later I still use it daily for astrophotography. It's compact and lightweight but will get surprisingly tall when you extend it to its full length. I've brought it with me hiking up hills/mountains and when I'm not using it as a hiking stick it's less cumbersome than my camera (which isn't even heavy). It's variable leg lengths are great for awkward terrain and its grippy feet keep it planted. Now for the negatives, it's not very heavy so it will get shaken by the wind easily, though I've never had it tip over even with top heavy cameras. On the topic of heavy cameras, my Canon 2000D is front heavy so if you loosen the ball head the camera will fall forward. Also when I'm zoomed in at 42X, like I am when I take pictures of Venus, the ball head can be grippy. Like when I try to move my framing over it will jump further than I wanted it too. One time the ball head got stuck in place a while ago and I had a tough time loosening it, but I've never had a problem since. All in all it's a perfect travel tripod. Works great for DSLRs, works even better for phones. You would have a tough time using something as big as a telescope on it, so in that case you would want a heavier tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent tripod, a review two years in the making.
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an inexpensive tripod and at $68 I'm overall satisfied with this tripod two years after purchase.Issues after two years of heavy use:- two of the legs not having strong latch at the top of the leg/near the central body. When new it was very stable but now I have to angle the legs juuust right to feel tight against the body.-The locking rings on one of the legs isn't very strong anymore and the leg will slide if I rock the tripod too much in the direction of the leg.-Ball head will not hold my Panasonic S5+100-400mm lens stable without drooping after setting position. This is when using a tripod collar on the lens.I think using the tripod at the beach and getting sand in the joints probably caused the issues I have but as mentioned I'm still pretty pleased. For someone not shooting around sand/dirt and not using a tripod very often this is a good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well after some minimal use since I purchased this tripod, I was using it for some astrophotography. While in use, mid shot, with no one even near it the plastic crumbled and it dumped my camera and lens into the dirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Accessories Kit
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this accessories kit for my GoPro HERO 3+ Silver Edition. It arrived on time and without a scratch. All of the various mounts are compatible with my GoPro HERO 3+ Silver Edition model. The accessories are of a very high quality and this kit is a very affordable option for GoPro users. I was skeptical because I had never heard of the brand "EEEKit" prior to my purchase of this accessories kit. However, I am very impressed with the product overall.The small gray bag is large enough to store a GoPro camera inside of the protective housing and is made of a "felt-like" material. I use the bag to store my GoPro when I am not using it to prevent scratching the protective housing. The Head Belt Strap Mount is large enough to be used with a helmet when expanded. I have used it while skiing, I put it on my helmet and it worked very well. The Chest Belt Mount works very well. It fits various body types due to the flexibility of the material it is made out of. The Extendable Handle Monopod is probably my favorite mount. It is expandable and is a good product for the price. I have not had the chance to use the Car Suction Cup Mount Holder, the Floating Handle Grip, 2 Piece Tripod Mount Adapter, 2 Piece Gopro Surface J-Hook. However, I intend to use them in the future as they seem to of a high quality.I would recommend this Accessories Kit to anyone that is looking to save some money and purchase a high quality Accessories Kit. Thank you for your time, and enjoy your GoPro.Be a HERO.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Tripod. Light, portable and super stable!
reviews.reviewText: First tripod I bought specifically for my new DSLR and it has been fantastic!
Prodotto di ottima qualità, sopra alle aspettative. Testato anche in acqua di mare, senza alcun problema. Rapporto qualità/prezzo eccellente, spedizione Amazon sempre top.Vivamente consigliato!

The plastic is high quality and everything fits perfectly with my ACTIVEON CX Gold Action Camera. Even the selfie stick works well - as long as you use the protective case. Taking the camera out of the case and sticking it on the selfie doesn't work, it just spins around. Maybe using a washer would help out because it just won't snug tight. Worth every penny I paid for it. I actually got lucky and the price went up by 31¢ to get above $25 and free shipping. Highly recommend this kit - can't wait to go on holiday!

Muy bueno el producto, me llego completo, es compacto y util, el material no es de la mejor calidad pero es muy funcional y resistente, a mi me ha servido perfectamente en mar, y en rios, hasta ahorita no he tenido problemas con los productos, estoy muy satisfecho con la compra, el producto llego en tiempo, y bien sellado, considero que vale la pena comprarlo, mas que nada por el precio, ya que los originales estan en mas de 1000 pesos cada accesorio.En resumen el producto comple con la calidad necesaria para poder usarla

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 1, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: Great kit at a bargain price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to go with my kitvision camera,. All the bits are compatable and well made .Absolute bargain for £20

reviews.reviewTitle: Loved it but a suggestion for Manufacturer
reviews.reviewText: It is one good and cheap accessories kit available in the Market. Product quality is good and all the connectors are also robust.They can make the stick portable with mobile phones also so that if you are not using GoPro you can attach your phone with it.
